results.headline: Vietnam Vows to Keep Lights on in Electronics Hub:
results.summary: Vietnam’s state electricity monopoly says power shortages will be avoided in its northern electronics hub — where Apple Inc. suppliers and Samsung Electronics Co. have major factories — despite surging demand and anticipated heat waves.

results.authors: By Victoria Batchelor and Yihui Xie
results.headline: More Pressure: The Bloomberg Close, Asia Edition
results.summary: Good afternoon. Here’s what you need to know to end your day.

results.headline: Kim Kardashian, Mike Tyson Join Business Magnates at Ambani Wedding in India
results.summary: Celebrities from Kim and Khloe Kardashian to boxer Mike Tyson are expected to join some of the biggest names in global business at a lavish family wedding thrown by Asia’s richest person, set to take place Friday in India after months of celebrations.

results.headline: Bloomberg Daybreak Asia: Bill Hwang Convicted (Podcast)
Five Things You Need to Know to Start Your Day: Asia
results.summary: Good morning. The S&P 500 tops 5,600 for the first time. Google parent Alphabet shelves efforts to acquire HubSpot. China tightens rules on short selling. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee

results.headline: Australia News Today: RBA-RBNZ Divergence, Pension Transfers, Nuclear Pivot
results.summary: Good morning, it’s Amy in Melbourne with the news you need to know this Thursday. Today’s must-reads:• RBA could hike, RBNZ could ease• Nuclear pivot debated• Expat pension woes

results.headline: Highest Ever: The Bloomberg Open, Asia Edition
results.summary: Good morning. The S&P 500 sets a new record. The US seeks to stop steel transshipments. And Hong Kong’s luxury housing market picks up.

results.authors: By Debby Wu, Takashi Mochizuki, and Yuan Gao
results.headline: Apple Bets on AI to Drive Demand for iPhone 16, Targets 10% Growth in Shipments
results.summary: Apple Inc. aims to ship at least 90 million iPhone 16 devices in the latter half of this year, counting on AI services to fuel demand for its new lineup after a rocky 2023.

results.headline: Samsung Galaxy Fold 6, Flip 6 Release Date, Price and AI Plans
results.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. sees the addition of AI features as the key to reclaiming its title as the world’s leading maker of foldables, mobile chief TM Roh said on the eve of unveiling its latest models.
